header.devise: Building innovative web solutions, from front-end to back-end, with passion.

propos.partie1: Currently studying for an MBA in Full-Stack Development, and working part-time at Edissio, I've always been passionate about computer programming since my high school years. It's this passion that led me to specialize in this field, which is both creative and logical. Throughout my studies and professional experiences, I've had the opportunity to develop my skills in both development, in front-end and back-end, as well as project management.
propos.partie2: In addition to my current expertise, I'm constantly seeking new knowledge to stay up-to-date in our ever-evolving field.
propos.partie3: When I'm not immersed in programming, you'll find me on the tennis court, enjoying time with my friends, or simply relaxing in front of a good film or video game.
